ensip-5.title: ENSIP-5
ensip-5.description: A group of entities that have been empowered by a larger organization to undertake some activity.

avatar.description: A URL to an image used as an avatar or logo

display.description: A canonical display name for the ENS name; this MUST match the ENS name when its case is folded, and clients should ignore this value if it does not (e.g. "ricmoo.eth" could set this to "RicMoo.eth")

keywords.description: A list of comma-separated keywords, ordered by most significant first; clients that interpresent this field may choose a threshold beyond which to ignore

phone.description: A phone number as an E.164 string
